name: Swift Exporters
title: Fastest Export Clearance
description: In 2019, Albania boasted one of the quickest export clearance times globally, averaging just 1.1 days for customs processing.

name: Tax Talkers
title: Frequent Tax Meetings
description: A staggering 93.2% of firms in Albania reported having meetings with tax officials in 2019, with an average of 5.7 meetings per affected firm.

name: Patent Pioneers
title: Minimal Nonresident Patent Applications
description: In 2021, Albania had only one patent application from nonresidents, indicating a low level of foreign innovation activity.

name: Railway Runners
title: Limited Railway Usage
description: Albania's railways transported 25.1 million ton-km of goods and only 0.812 million passenger-km in 2021, reflecting limited railway utilization.

name: Family Planning Gap
title: Low Family Planning Satisfaction
description: In 2018, only 6% of married women in Albania had their demand for family planning satisfied by modern methods, highlighting a significant gap.

name: Tech Trade Tumble
title: Minimal ICT Goods Imports
description: ICT goods made up just 0.21% of Albania's total goods imports in 2022, suggesting a low reliance on technology imports.
